PassiveDesc.Name: Corrosion
PassiveDesc.Desc: Moves to the next phase after HP drops to 1.

PassiveDesc.Name: Corrosion
PassiveDesc.Desc: Moves to the next phase after HP drops to 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Rekindled Flame
PassiveDesc.Desc: Lose 25% of Max HP and get Staggered when an ally dies.

PassiveDesc.Name: Ashes
PassiveDesc.Desc: Lose 1 Light upon getting Staggered.

PassiveDesc.Name: Affection
PassiveDesc.Desc: Whenever the character uses a page, its target is inflicted with 1 Affection.

PassiveDesc.Name: Nostalgic Embrace of the Old Days
PassiveDesc.Desc: If a librarian has 4 or more stacks of Affection, uses a powerful Combat Page.

PassiveDesc.Name: Momentary Satiation
PassiveDesc.Desc: If an ally has 20 or less HP, consume it at the start of the Scene to recover 20 HP and gain 2 Strength.

PassiveDesc.Name: Ravenousness
PassiveDesc.Desc: After taking 40 total damage during battle, consume the ally with the lowest HP at the start of the Scene and recover 40 HP. Permanently gain 2 Strength for each ally defeated this way.

PassiveDesc.Name: Ravening Hunger
PassiveDesc.Desc: If HP goes down to 50% or lower, restore Light to full at the start of the next Scene and add 3 powerful Combat Pages to hand.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fresh Meat
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, give the 'Fresh Meat' status to a random librarian.

PassiveDesc.Name: Care
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, restore 10 HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pronatalism
PassiveDesc.Desc: If there are 2 or fewer Worker Bees alive at the start of the Scene, inflict 2 Spores on all librarians.

PassiveDesc.Name: Metamorphosis
PassiveDesc.Desc: If a librarian dies while under the influence of Spores, spawn a Worker Bee next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pheromones
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses pages that boost the aggression and loyalty of all allies every 3 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Loyalty
PassiveDesc.Desc: Target the last foe Angela attacked in the previous Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Walls of Vines
PassiveDesc.Desc: Cannot be attacked until 5 Walls of Vines have been defeated.

PassiveDesc.Name: An Apple Deep in the Forest
PassiveDesc.Desc: After all 5 Walls of Vines have been taken down, resistances change for 2 Scenes. Afterwards, they return to normal.

PassiveDesc.Name: Strangling Vines
PassiveDesc.Desc: Creates a field of vines that spreads over 3 Scenes. Librarians standing on the vines are inflicted with Bind. The amount of Bind increases with the width of the vine field.

PassiveDesc.Name: Where’s My Prince?
PassiveDesc.Desc: When the field of vines grows to the maximum width, uses a powerful mass attack page that Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Withering
PassiveDesc.Desc: Suppression is complete when Angela has been handled.

PassiveDesc.Name: Corrosion
PassiveDesc.Desc: Moves to the next phase after HP drops to 1.

PassiveDesc.Name: Metallic Ringing
PassiveDesc.Desc: Inflict 2 Bind and Paralysis on a successful Blunt attack

PassiveDesc.Name: Violence
PassiveDesc.Desc: Restore 1 Light upon defeating an enemy and gain 2 Strength next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fear
PassiveDesc.Desc: All dice lose 4 Power when the character has status effects.

PassiveDesc.Name: Ends, Begins, Ends
PassiveDesc.Desc: After Fear is activated 2 times, uses a powerful single-target Combat Page.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fully Charged!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses a Mass Attack page if the character has 4 or more Light. If the character has not used the Mass Attack page for 3 Scenes, change its Cost to 0 and use it.

PassiveDesc.Name: Repetitive Pattern-Recognition Mk2
PassiveDesc.Desc: After dealing 10 or higher total damage with a Combat Page, restore 1 Light.

PassiveDesc.Name: Repetitive Pattern-Recognition
PassiveDesc.Desc: After dealing 10 or higher total damage in a Scene, restore 1 Light.

PassiveDesc.Name: Please Work Harder!
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, if one or more allies are alive, gain 4 Protection, and recover 10 HP for the ally with the lowest HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Let’s Make Music!
PassiveDesc.Desc: On the Scene 'I CRAVE that Melody!' is activated, uses a page that buffs allies.

PassiveDesc.Name: Harmony of Despair
PassiveDesc.Desc: While the Singing Machine is playing music, uses a powerful Combat Page

PassiveDesc.Name: The Machine that Sings
PassiveDesc.Desc: Cannot be targeted. Does not act. Takes no damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Begin Performance
PassiveDesc.Desc: If a character is inside the machine at the start of the Scene after 'I CRAVE that Melody!' was activated, activates 'Performance' for the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Performance
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, the character inside the machine takes damage equal to 30% of their Max HP. While the music is playing, all characters gain 5 Strength and all Stagger damage resistances change to "Fatal".

PassiveDesc.Name: I CRAVE that Melody!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Starting with the third Scene: every four Scenes, inflict 5 Bind to self, gain an extra Speed die, and use a different set of Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Music Addiction
PassiveDesc.Desc: If no one is inside Singing Machine by the end of the Scene 'I CRAVE that Melody!' was activated, the Addicted Employee with the lowest HP enters the machine.

PassiveDesc.Name: Hand of Salvation
PassiveDesc.Desc: Targets the enemy with the least HP. Prioritizes targets with Sealed dice.

PassiveDesc.Name: Anguish
PassiveDesc.Desc: Dice gain Power depending on the target's HP. (75%~50% HP: Power +1; 50% or lower: Power +2)

PassiveDesc.Name: Tranquility
PassiveDesc.Desc: If all of a character's Speed dice are Sealed by this character's page effects, they become Staggered.

PassiveDesc.Name: Lamentation
PassiveDesc.Desc: If there's a Staggered enemy at the start of the Scene, uses a special Combat Page

PassiveDesc.Name: Eternal Rest
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses a Mass Attack page every 3 Scenes

PassiveDesc.Name: Futile Fluttering
PassiveDesc.Desc: Targets the enemy with the least HP; suppressed when Angela moves to the next phase.

PassiveDesc.Name: Seven Bullets
PassiveDesc.Desc: Stagger Resist does not fall below 1. If Angela's Stagger Resist reaches 1, lose 50 HP and recover all Stagger Resist next Scene, and change behavior.

PassiveDesc.Name: Expressions
PassiveDesc.Desc: The number of Speed dice is determimed based on the number of librarians that are alive. Uses different Combat Pages based on the face made at the moment of rolling the Speed dice.

PassiveDesc.Name: Put a Bigger Smile on your Face
PassiveDesc.Desc: Dice gain differing amounts of Power depending on the current expression; happier expressions indicate less Power. The Combat Pages Angela uses have additional effects that depend on her current expression.

PassiveDesc.Name: Wavering Feelings
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses a powerful Combat Page every 3 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Attracted
PassiveDesc.Desc: Prioritizes targets with Bleed.

PassiveDesc.Name: Massive Axe
PassiveDesc.Desc: Inflicts 1 'Profound Wound' on hit. If target has 5 stacks of Profound Wound, deal damage equal to 25% of their Max HP and remove all stacks of Profound Wound.

PassiveDesc.Name: Glitter
PassiveDesc.Desc: If an enemy has 3 or more Bleed at the start of the Scene, uses a powerful Combat Page. Once used, the page is not used again for the next 2 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Speedy
PassiveDesc.Desc: Speed Dice Slot +1

PassiveDesc.Name: The Hunt Begins
PassiveDesc.Desc: Become active and target foes for two Scenes after an ally dies. Targets foes that have killed an ally.

PassiveDesc.Name: Alertness
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every 2 Scenes, give 4 Protection to other allies.

PassiveDesc.Name: Dinnertime!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Targets foes with the 'Cocoon' status

PassiveDesc.Name: I’ll Give You a Gift!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Prioritizes the target with the least amount of 'Gifts' in hand

PassiveDesc.Name: Funny Prank
PassiveDesc.Desc: Adds a 'Gift' to every librarian's hand every 2 Scenes. Gives an additional 'Gift' for every two Wee Witch’s Friends that have died.

PassiveDesc.Name: Huuuuge~ Gift!!
PassiveDesc.Desc: If all Gift-wrapped Friends are defeated, uses a Mass Attack page next Scene. Afterwards, that page is used every 3 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Will You Play With Me?
PassiveDesc.Desc: Block dice lose Power by 4x the number of 'Gifts' in the opponent's hand

PassiveDesc.Name: Being Lonely is Sad
PassiveDesc.Desc: If all other allies have died, all resistances change to "Fatal"

PassiveDesc.Name: Gi…ft…
PassiveDesc.Desc: Prioritizes the target with the most amount of 'Gifts' in hand

PassiveDesc.Name: BOOM!
PassiveDesc.Desc: On the third Scene, uses a powerful Combat Page that deals significant damage and gives three copies of 'Gift' to its target before causing the user to self-destruct. The character dies after using that page.

PassiveDesc.Name: Here Comes a Surprise Present
PassiveDesc.Desc: If this character dies, a Wee Witch’s Friend is spawned next Scene. If the character is killed before it can self-destruct using the special Combat Page, the Friend is spawned with 80% HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Gi…ft…
PassiveDesc.Desc: Prioritizes the target with the most amount of 'Gifts' in hand

PassiveDesc.Name: Gimme That Gift!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Offensive dice gain Power equal to the number of 'Gifts' in the target's hand

PassiveDesc.Name: Clothing of Nettle
PassiveDesc.Desc: Starting with Scene 2, summon a Brother at the start of each Scene. Does not activate if there are already 5 allies alive.

PassiveDesc.Name: Family to Protect
PassiveDesc.Desc: If four Brothers are alive at the start of the Scene, uses a Mass Attack page

PassiveDesc.Name: Broken Dream
PassiveDesc.Desc: If four Brothers have died at the start of the Scene, uses a Mass Attack page

PassiveDesc.Name: First Brother
PassiveDesc.Desc: While this character is alive, Angela gains a Speed die

PassiveDesc.Name: Second Brother
PassiveDesc.Desc: While this character is alive, Angela's Speed values increase by 3

PassiveDesc.Name: Third Brother
PassiveDesc.Desc: While this character is alive, Angela uses a Combat Page that reflects attacks

PassiveDesc.Name: Fourth Brother
PassiveDesc.Desc: While this character is alive, Angela's attacks deal "Fatal" damage regardless of resistances

PassiveDesc.Name: Fifth Brother
PassiveDesc.Desc: While this character is alive, Angela uses a Combat Page that inflicts 5 Bleed and Fragile

PassiveDesc.Name: Sixth Brother
PassiveDesc.Desc: If this character dies, Angela becomes Staggered

PassiveDesc.Name: Tentacles
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon a successful Pierce attack, reduces target's Max Stagger Resist by 5%. (Stacks up to 10 times)

PassiveDesc.Name: Echoes
PassiveDesc.Desc: Starting with the third Scene, uses the Combat Page 'Echoes from the Beyond' every 2 Scenes

PassiveDesc.Name: Incomprehensible
PassiveDesc.Desc: Deal double Stagger damage with attacks

PassiveDesc.Name: Universe of Two
PassiveDesc.Desc: After all other allies have died, lose HP and become Staggered. Becomes targetable afterwards.

PassiveDesc.Name: Parting Tears
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, if an ally is in suspended animation, switch to Crying mode; if not, switch to Healing mode. If the character is in Crying mode at the start of a Scene, uses a Mass Attack page.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pebble
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character is in Healing mode at the start of the Scene, restore the HP of all other allies by 10% of their max HP, and take no action.

PassiveDesc.Name: Don’t Leave Me
PassiveDesc.Desc: HP does not go below 1; upon taking lethal damage, enter a state of suspended animation for the next 2 Scenes. Recover 70% of Max HP when waking up from the status. If all allies excluding Angela have 1 HP at the start of the Scene, die.

PassiveDesc.Name: Unbearable Pleasure
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, characters restore 1 Light for each page of 'Pleasure' in their hand. On hit, if the target has three pages of 'Pleasure', deal 20 damage and exhaust those pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Time for the Head to Burst
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses a Mass Attack page if a librarian has 2 or more copies of 'Pleasure'. Once used, the page is not used again for the next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Thorns Granting Happiness
PassiveDesc.Desc: On hit, give the target 2 Positive Emotion Coins.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fluttering
PassiveDesc.Desc: Take no damage from Ranged pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Doll Fashioned from Earth
PassiveDesc.Desc: Takes no damage from Burn or Bleed.

PassiveDesc.Name: Blossoming Fragrance
PassiveDesc.Desc: This character's attacks only deal Stagger damage to librarians. If a librarian becomes Staggered, they are instantly killed, and 'One Who Emerged from the Earth' is spawned next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Breathless Atonement
PassiveDesc.Desc: This character only takes damage from the librarian with the 'Laurel Wreath' status.

PassiveDesc.Name: Unwithering Flower
PassiveDesc.Desc: Starting with Scene 2, a petal blooms behind Angela at the start of each Scene. If three petals have accumulated at the start of a Scene, remove all of them and use a Mass Attack page.

PassiveDesc.Name: Tears of Petals
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon becoming Staggered, lose 40 HP and remove all petals at the start of the next Scene. In addition, all librarians recover 50% of their max Stagger Resist.

PassiveDesc.Name: To the Earth Whence I Come…
PassiveDesc.Desc: This character dies upon becoming Staggered.

PassiveDesc.Name: Doll Fashioned from Earth
PassiveDesc.Desc: Takes no damage from Burn or Bleed.

PassiveDesc.Name: Blossoming Fragrance
PassiveDesc.Desc: This character's attacks only deal Stagger damage to librarians. If a librarian becomes Staggered, they are instantly killed, and 'One Who Emerged from the Earth' is spawned next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: The World’s Most Beautiful Performance
PassiveDesc.Desc: The battle lasts 5 Scenes; progresses to the next phase on Scene 6. Uses unique Combat Pages each Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Ensemble
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, gain Power equal to the number of other allies who can act

PassiveDesc.Name: Silent Performance
PassiveDesc.Desc: Does not use Combat Pages. Upon becoming Staggered, become Immobilized for the duration of the phase.

PassiveDesc.Name: The World’s Most Beautiful Performance
PassiveDesc.Desc: Follows a unique pattern of behavior that cycles every 6 Scenes. Resistances and the amount of Speed dice change every Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Ever-repeating Performance
PassiveDesc.Desc: After using the Combat Page 'Curtain Call', recover the HP of all allies. The healing diminishes with every repeat.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fervent Adoration
PassiveDesc.Desc: Staggered librarians are given the 'Fervent Adoration' status.

PassiveDesc.Name: Ensemble
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, gain Power equal to the number of other allies who can act

PassiveDesc.Name: Silent Climax
PassiveDesc.Desc: Does not act during the fifth and sixth measures of the cycle

PassiveDesc.Name: Adverse Change
PassiveDesc.Desc: When the Hysteria gauge is filled, transform. The Hysteria gauge rises upon losing clashes or being attacked by marked characters, and decreases upon winning clashes or attacking marked characters. The screen pinkens from left to right as the gauge fills. At the end of the Scene, restore all Light and draw 2 pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: In the Name of Hate
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses a page that leaves a "mark" on the target every 2 Scenes. All resistances on the marked character change to "Weak", and the character will be primarily targeted by Roland.

PassiveDesc.Name: Arcana Slave
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses a Mass Attack page that targets all librarians every 4 Scenes. Each individual librarian can negate the attack if the sum of all dice rolls on the page played by them is equal to or higher than the mass attack's dice roll.

PassiveDesc.Name: Loyal Protection
PassiveDesc.Desc: Cannot be targeted. Does not act.

PassiveDesc.Name: Sorrow
PassiveDesc.Desc: Give Tears to a random sword every 3 Scenes. If the character is Staggered, activates the Scene after.

PassiveDesc.Name: Despair
PassiveDesc.Desc: When a sword with Tears takes lethal damage, falls into Despair next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Blessing of Despair
PassiveDesc.Desc: When the character falls into Despair, all swords fully recover HP and Stagger Resist, and use special Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: A Broken Heart
PassiveDesc.Desc: If all swords impale the character in Despair state, become Staggered and targetable next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Tears
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain a Speed die, use special pages, and change resistances while under the effect of Tears.

PassiveDesc.Name: Respite
PassiveDesc.Desc: Enter a state of suspension upon taking lethal damage. Revives after two Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Sword that Pierces Despair
PassiveDesc.Desc: If this fails to deal any damage to its target while in Despair state, the sword will impale Roland, dealing damage to him.

PassiveDesc.Name: Flicking Desire
PassiveDesc.Desc: If HP falls to 50% or lower, transform into the King of Greed next Scene. HP does not go below 50% before transformation.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Road of Gold
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every 3 Scenes, creates Brilliant Bliss and becomes untargetable, but does not act. The following Scene, uses a special Combat Page against all librarians.

PassiveDesc.Name: Narcissism
PassiveDesc.Desc: If three or fewer librarians manage to negate the attack of the special Combat Page, gain 3 Strength and Haste next Scene. (If two or less librarians are alive, one or no librarians negating the page will activate this effect)

PassiveDesc.Name: Momentary Bliss
PassiveDesc.Desc: If all librarians successfully negate the attack of the special Combat Page, Roland becomes Staggered next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: The King of Greed
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses a different set of Combat Pages. On a successful hit, deal bonus damage equal to stacks of Bleed on the target.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Road of the King
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every 3 Scenes, creates Brilliant Bliss and becomes untargetable, but does not act. The following Scene, uses a special Combat Page against a single target.

PassiveDesc.Name: Voracity
PassiveDesc.Desc: If a librarian fails to negate any one of the special Combat Page's attacks, deal 15 damage to all librarians and recover 25 HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: A Moment’s Bliss
PassiveDesc.Desc: If a librarian successfully negates all attacks of the special Combat Page, Roland becomes Staggered next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Brilliant Bliss
PassiveDesc.Desc: Exists for one Scene. Gives special Combat Pages to the librarian that defeats it.

PassiveDesc.Name: Today’s Play
PassiveDesc.Desc: Only Roland can defeat the Hermit. The battle proceeds to the next phase when the Hermit is defeated.

PassiveDesc.Name: Blind Rage
PassiveDesc.Desc: Prioritizes attacking Hermit’s Staves. If no Hermit’s Staff is present, attacks the Hermit.

PassiveDesc.Name: Sinners of the Otherworlds!
PassiveDesc.Desc: While one or more Hermit's Staves are present, after taking 30 total damage, uses a Mass Attack page, 'EMBODIMENTS OF EVIL!!!!' on the following Scene. The total damage counter is reset afterwards.

PassiveDesc.Name: Boiling Anger
PassiveDesc.Desc: When Roland starts attacking the Hermit, uses a Mass Attack page, 'EMBODIMENTS OF EVIL!!!!'. The page is used every 2 Scenes after.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Exploited
PassiveDesc.Desc: HP does not fall below 30 from a librarian's attacks. If the character's HP is at 30 or lower at the end of a Scene, recovers 50% of Max HP next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Dear Companion
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gains +5 Power when clashing against Roland. Takes no damage from Burn, Bleed, or Erosion.

PassiveDesc.Name: Visitor from Another World
PassiveDesc.Desc: While one or more Hermit’s Staves are present, uses a Mass Attack page every 2 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: When Two Realms Meet
PassiveDesc.Desc: Changes behavior when all Hermit’s Staves are defeated. On the first Scene of the new cycle, attacks Roland. After attacking Roland again on the second Scene, again on the second Scene, uses a Mass Attack page that summons more Hermit’s Staves.

PassiveDesc.Name: Hermit’s Staff
PassiveDesc.Desc: Attacks Roland.

PassiveDesc.Name: All Returns to Nil
PassiveDesc.Desc: Has unique modes of behavior that cycle in the following order: Nihil -> Greed -> Hate -> Despair -> Wrath. Each mode features different passive abilities and Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pointless Endeavor
PassiveDesc.Desc: Takes no Stagger damage outside of 'Wrath' mode. Takes no damage from Bleed, Burn, Erosion. This character's Speed dice cannot be Sealed.

PassiveDesc.Name: Worthless Greed
PassiveDesc.Desc: Combat Pages used against this character lose 5 Power unless the 'Magical Girl of Happiness' is the user. Each time this character loses a clash, a random ally gains the Combat Page 'Fragment of Bliss'. Uses a Mass Attack page 'The Road of Gold' on the second Scene. If all allies negate the attack of 'The Road of Gold', loses 50 HP and shifts to 'Hate' mode next Scene. If any ally is hit, deal 10 damage to all librarians and restore 20 HP. On a successful hit, deals bonus damage equal to the amount of Bleed on the target.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pointless Hate
PassiveDesc.Desc: Combat Pages used against this character lose 5 Power unless the 'Magical Girl of Love' is the user. After winning 10 total clashes, uses a Mass Attack page 'Arcana Slave' on the next Scene. If the Magical Girl of Love uses 'Arcana Slave!', loses 50 HP and shifts to 'Despair' mode next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Meaningless Despair
PassiveDesc.Desc: Combat Pages used against this character lose 5 Power unless the 'Magical Girl of Justice' is the user. If all dice on a Combat Page this character uses lose or draw in a clash, that page will be locked out starting with the next Scene. If all three pages are locked out, loses 50 HP and shifts to 'Wrath' mode next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Senseless Wrath
PassiveDesc.Desc: Combat Pages used against this character lose 5 Power unless the 'Magical Girl of Courage' is the user. Uses a Mass Attack page every 2 Scenes. Upon becoming Staggered, loses 50 HP and shifts to 'Nihil' mode.

PassiveDesc.Name: Petrified Hate
PassiveDesc.Desc: The Magical Girl of Love will stand in for the librarian that breaks this statue at the start of the next Scene. If a Magical Girl breaks the statue, the librarian with the lowest current HP will be replaced instead. Magical Girls possess special Key pages with unique stats, passive abilities and Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Ossified Despair
PassiveDesc.Desc: The Magical Girl of Justice will stand in for the librarian that breaks this statue at the start of the next Scene. If a Magical Girl breaks the statue, the librarian with the lowest current HP will be replaced instead. Magical Girls possess special Key pages with unique stats, passive abilities and Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fossilized Greed
PassiveDesc.Desc: The Magical Girl of Happiness will stand in for the librarian that breaks this statue at the start of the next Scene. If a Magical Girl breaks the statue, the librarian with the lowest current HP will be replaced instead. Magical Girls possess special Key pages with unique stats, passive abilities and Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Lapidified Wrath
PassiveDesc.Desc: The Magical Girl of Courage will stand in for the librarian that breaks this statue at the start of the next Scene. If a Magical Girl breaks the statue, the librarian with the lowest current HP will be replaced instead. Magical Girls possess special Key pages with unique stats, passive abilities and Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Sword without an Owner
PassiveDesc.Desc: Targets any character other than the Magical Girl of Justice.

PassiveDesc.Name: A Real Magical Girl
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, draw 3 pages and fully restore Light.

PassiveDesc.Name: Love!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses a set of unique Combat Pages. After winning 10 clashes in total, the Cost of 'Arcana Slave!' is reduced to 0. (Cost is reset upon using the page)

PassiveDesc.Name: Justice!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses a set of unique Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Happiness!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses a set of unique Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Courage!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses a set of unique Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: End of the Nightmare
PassiveDesc.Desc: The battle progresses to the next phase if Mercenary Roland finishes off the Wolf; the battle is lost if he dies before the Wolf does.

PassiveDesc.Name: Vengefulness
PassiveDesc.Desc: At 50% HP or lower, gain 1 Strength each Scene. (Does not activate during Rage or Astray Rage)

PassiveDesc.Name: No Hesitation
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses 'Strike Without Hesitation' every 2 Scenes, targeting all characters.

PassiveDesc.Name: Rage
PassiveDesc.Desc: When the Rage meter is filled, enters a state of rage. The Rage meter rises upon taking damage from the Wolf, and decreases upon dealing damage to the Wolf. The screen becomes redder as the Rage meter fills. (Rage: Lasts 2 Scenes. Gain +2 Strength each Scene, and use Mass Attack pages.)

PassiveDesc.Name: Fury with No Outlet
PassiveDesc.Desc: If a librarian lands a killing blow on the Wolf, enters an 'Astray Rage' state, then recovers 50% of Max HP and fully recovers Stagger Resist. (Astray Rage: Permanently persists. Gain +4 Strength each Scene, and use Mass Attack pages.)

PassiveDesc.Name: Sharp Claws
PassiveDesc.Desc: Inflict 1 Scars to target on hit. Deal bonus damage equal to stacks of Scars on target. Dice gain +2 Power against targets with 4 or more Scars.

PassiveDesc.Name: Roaring Wolf
PassiveDesc.Desc: While HP is higher than 50%, uses a Mass Attack page, 'Howl', every 4 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Howling Nightmare
PassiveDesc.Desc: When HP falls to 50% or lower, gains 2 Speed dice and uses 'Howl' every 2 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Role of the Wolf
PassiveDesc.Desc: On combat start, swallows a random assistant librarian. If the swallowed librarian escapes or gets digested, swallows another librarian after 2 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Hour of Poetic Justice
PassiveDesc.Desc: After swallowing a librarian, temporarily double Max Stagger Resist and fully recover it; then all Stagger damage resistances change to "Fatal" for the next Scene. The number of Speed dice change, and different Combat Pages will be used. If Wolf Roland is Staggered within the Scene, expel the captive librarian.

PassiveDesc.Name: Sheep’s Skin
PassiveDesc.Desc: The librarian that was swallowed loses 25% of their Max HP upon being expelled and becomes Staggered.

PassiveDesc.Name: Instincts
PassiveDesc.Desc: If Wolf Roland does not get Staggered after the Scene it swallows a librarian, the librarian is killed.

PassiveDesc.Name: Destined to be the Big Bad Wolf
PassiveDesc.Desc: If two librarians have been consumed and digested, transform. Also transforms if HP is at 50% or lower at the start of a Scene. HP does not fall below 50% before transforming.

PassiveDesc.Name: Transform
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon transforming, Max Stagger Resist increases, and Stagger Resist is recovered to full.

PassiveDesc.Name: Into the Dark
PassiveDesc.Desc: After the character loses 25% or more of the HP it had at the point of transformation, gain the 'Skulking in the Shadows' status for the next 2 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shadowy Lurker
PassiveDesc.Desc: While the character has the 'Skulking in the Shadows' status, librarians other than the ones targeted by the character cannot target it.

PassiveDesc.Name: Weariness
PassiveDesc.Desc: After 'Skulking in the Shadows' wears off, uses a Mass Attack page, 'Howl'; all Stagger damage resistances change to "Fatal" for the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: In Search of Corpses
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses Combat Pages other than 'Horrid Screech' and 'Vomit' indiscriminately. Recovers 30% of current HP upon defeating an ally.

PassiveDesc.Name: Melted Corpses
PassiveDesc.Desc: Each time the character loses more than 25% of the Max. HP (62/87/112), 'Melting Corpses' is spawned at the start of the next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Dividing
PassiveDesc.Desc: Divides into corpses when HP drops to 0. If all corpses are defeated within 3 Scenes, the battle progresses to the next phase. Otherwise, the character revives as Stage 1. (Upon revival, it will recover HP by the sum of the HP all remaining Melting Corpses had.)

PassiveDesc.Name: Growing Mass
PassiveDesc.Desc: Transforms to Stage 2 upon fully recovering HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Divisible Yet Addable
PassiveDesc.Desc: Transforms back to Stage 1 when HP drops to 0. Transforms to Stage 3 upon fully recovering HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Terrifying Laughter
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, gain 1 Strength. Uses 'Horrid Screech' every 2 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Division
PassiveDesc.Desc: Transforms back to Stage 2 when HP drops to 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Putrid Vomit
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, gain 2 Strength. Uses 'Vomit' every 2 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Rot
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon taking a hit, deal 8 damage to the librarian that attacked it and inflict 1 Fragile to them.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fear of Water
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has less than 5 Blood, gain Strength proportional to the amount of Blood missing. (Up to 3)

PassiveDesc.Name: Thirst
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 2 or less Blood, uses a special Combat Page. (Has a 2 Scene cooldown.)

PassiveDesc.Name: Banquet of Blood
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 5 or more Blood, uses a Mass Attack page: 'Banquet of Blood'. (Has a 3 Scene cooldown.) If the character did not use the page for the first 4 Scenes of the phase, it will be used on the 5th Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shapeshifting
PassiveDesc.Desc: If HP falls to 50% or lower, shapeshift next Scene. HP does not go below 50% before this. Upon shapeshifting, defeat all Sanguine Bats and gain 5 Blood.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shapeshifting
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon shapeshifting, defeat all Sanguine Bats and gain 5 Blood.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fear of Water
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has less than 5 Blood, gain Strength proportional to the amount of Blood missing. (Up to 3)

PassiveDesc.Name: Flowing Blood
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, lose 1 Blood.

PassiveDesc.Name: Unbearable Drought
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 2 or less Blood, uses a special Combat Page. (Has a 2 Scene cooldown.)

PassiveDesc.Name: Lust for Blood
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 0 Blood, uses a Mass Attack page: 'Lust for Blood'. (Has a 3 Scene cooldown.) If the character did not use the page for 3 Scenes after shapeshifting, it will be used on the 4th Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fear of Water
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 1 or less Blood, gain 2 Strength.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shell
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every 2 Scenes, uses the Combat Page 'Wear Shell' on a random assistant librarian.

PassiveDesc.Name: Evolving
PassiveDesc.Desc: If HP reaches 0, morphs into its second form at the start of the next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Still Evolving
PassiveDesc.Desc: After 2 Scenes pass, evolve into the third form. The HP of the third form depends on the amount of HP this current form has left at the moment of evolution. (Min. 70% of Max. HP)

PassiveDesc.Name: Regenerative
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, recover 50% of Max. HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Hardness
PassiveDesc.Desc: Ignores instances of damage that would deal 10 or less.

PassiveDesc.Name: Regenerative
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character took 80 or less damage within a Scene, recovers 10% of Max. HP at the end of the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Bountiful Crop
PassiveDesc.Desc: Prioritizes the target with the most copies of 'Wisdom' in hand. Dice gain Power equal to the number of 'Wisdoms' in target's hand.

PassiveDesc.Name: Harvest
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses a powerful Combat Page every 3 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Gleaning Sagacity
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every 3 Scenes, gains an additional Speed die and uses the page 'Harvest Wisdom', which absorbs the target's Combat Page and recovers the user's HP on hit. If the target has no Combat Pages left to absorb, deals bonus damage (5~20) instead.

PassiveDesc.Name: Tranquility of the Wise
PassiveDesc.Desc: If 'Harvest Wisdom' clashes against 'Wisdom', the harvester (user) takes 20 Stagger damage at the end of the engagement, and gains 3 Feeble and Bind next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Cerebral Endeavor
PassiveDesc.Desc: After absorbing a page that isn't 'Wisdom' with 'Harvest Wisdom', gain Strength and Endurance equal to the number of pages absorbed, and use one of the absorbed pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Straw for Brains
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, all librarians who own no pages become Staggered.

PassiveDesc.Name: Dense Forest
PassiveDesc.Desc: All librarians restore Light to max for the duration of the phase.

PassiveDesc.Name: Still Not Enough
PassiveDesc.Desc: Each Scene, targets the character with the most Light. When attacking, all dice gain Power equal to the amount of Light the target has.

PassiveDesc.Name: A Warm Heart
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, restore Light equal to the amount of Warm Hearts. Lose 1 stack of Warm Heart at the end of the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: I Want a Heart
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, if the amount of Warm Hearts is 0, target the Tree with the lowest HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pulsing Ticker
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon defeating another character, recover 20% of Max HP and gain 3 stacks of Warm Heart.

PassiveDesc.Name: Empty Chest
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has no Warm Heart for 2 Scenes, becomes Staggered at the start of the next Scene. Cull a Tree with the lowest HP when recovering from Stagger.

PassiveDesc.Name: On the Way Home
PassiveDesc.Desc: Spawns the 'Home' when the phase starts, and uses a Mass Attack page that applies 'Yellow Brick Road' to the 'Home' and two librarians.

PassiveDesc.Name: Friends! Let’s Go Home~!
PassiveDesc.Desc: On the second Scene, uses the Combat Page 'Friends! Let’s Go Home~!' targeting the 'Home' and the librarians with 'Yellow Brick Road'. If the Combat Page hits 'Home', the battle is lost. The attack on the 'Home' is canceled if all librarians with 'Yellow Brick Road' win the clash against 'Friends! Let’s Go Home~!'.

PassiveDesc.Name: You… Gosh Darned Wizard…!
PassiveDesc.Desc: After the character's attack towards 'Home' has been canceled twice, all resistances change to "Fatal", and uses a powerful Mass Attack the following Scene. If any librarian is hit by the attack, the 'Home' is spawned next Scene. If no librarian is damaged by the attack, the character becomes Staggered next Scene, and the 'Home' is spawned the Scene after the Stagger.

PassiveDesc.Name: Courageous
PassiveDesc.Desc: Is immune to all types of damage until 'The Road Home' dies.

PassiveDesc.Name: Cowardly
PassiveDesc.Desc: Once 'The Road Home' dies, all resistances change to "Fatal", and Max HP is reduced. The number of Speed dice and Combat Pages also change.

PassiveDesc.Name: Revive
PassiveDesc.Desc: On the first Scene, uses Combat Pages that awaken all Jacks and inflict Oblivion on a librarian. Afterwards, follows a unique pattern of behavior that cycles every 4 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Agony of the Deprived
PassiveDesc.Desc: After a librarian with Oblivion is restored from the status, all resistances of this character change to "Fatal" at the start of the next Scene, and uses a Mass Attack page. Repeats the pattern afterwards.

PassiveDesc.Name: Grief of the Deprived
PassiveDesc.Desc: After 2 cycles have passed, all Stagger damage resistances of this character change to "Fatal" at the start of the next Scene, and uses an extremely powerful Mass Attack page.

PassiveDesc.Name: Stolen Power
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses the Combat Pages of the librarian with Oblivion.

PassiveDesc.Name: Who’s the Real Deal?
PassiveDesc.Desc: Only one of the Jacks that awaken is real; the rest are fakes. Whenever a librarian with Oblivion hits the real Jack, it gives back a Combat Page that was stolen from them. The screen blinks when the real Jack is hit.

PassiveDesc.Name: Steal or be Stolen
PassiveDesc.Desc: After the librarian with Oblivion hits the real Jack 9 times, all Jacks die. If the condition isn't fulfilled within 3 Scenes of Oblivion being applied, the librarian with the status is turned into a pumpkin next Scene. Afterwards, the real Jack transforms into 'Jack Revived', and permanently uses the Key page and Combat Pages of the librarian that had Oblivion.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Wizard's Trial
PassiveDesc.Desc: Five phases play out in a set order. If all five phases have been passed, proceed to the 'Anger' phase. Is immune to Stagger damage before The Road Home's phase starts. Is immune to physical damage before the Anger phase starts.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Trial Commences
PassiveDesc.Desc: When the phase begins, dead librarians come back to life with full HP. Add 5 special Combat Pages to the hands of all librarians. The following phases can be overcome using their special powers.

PassiveDesc.Name: Show Me Your Warm Heart
PassiveDesc.Desc: Limits the amount of Light of all librarians other than the one with the Woodsman's status. If all 'Emerald Crystals' are destroyed within 2 Scenes, proceed to the Scarecrow's phase next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: How Hollow a Heart
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the 'Emerald Crystals' are not destroyed within 2 Scenes, a Mass Attack page is used before proceeding to the Scarecrow's phase.

PassiveDesc.Name: Show Me Your Wisdom
PassiveDesc.Desc: Turn all librarians other than the one with the Scarecrow's status into 'Shining Statues'. A copy of 'Wisdom' and 4 special Combat Pages are added to the Scarecrow librarian's hand. Proceed to the Cat's phase next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: What Worthless Wisdom
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the librarians aren't restored to their true forms by the end of the Scene, reduce the number of Speed dice of the Scarecrow librarian to 1.

PassiveDesc.Name: Show Me Your Courage
PassiveDesc.Desc: Inflict all librarians with 10 Feeble, Disarm, and Fragile for 2 Scenes. If all 'Scowling Faces' are defeated, proceed to The Road Home's phase the following Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Twas Certain of Catly Cowardice
PassiveDesc.Desc: If a librarian other than the one with the Cat's status gets hit, the Cat librarian is inflicted with 5 Feeble, Disarm, and Fragile until the end of battle.

PassiveDesc.Name: What Could You Do?
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon becoming Staggered, proceed to the Anger phase the following Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Anger
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character's HP reaches 0 or is transformed into a different being, the battle is won.

PassiveDesc.Name: Crystal Containing Light
PassiveDesc.Desc: Deals 8 physical and Stagger damage to the attacker. When destroyed, the 1-Light capacity limit is lifted from a librarian.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shattering Emerald
PassiveDesc.Desc: If not restored to their true form until the end of the Scene, take damage equal to 80% of current HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: A Lamp that Burns Forever
PassiveDesc.Desc: Starting with the first Scene, inflicts a random assistant librarian with 'Enchanted' every 3 Scenes. More librarians are affected with subsequent occurrences (1-2-2-3).

PassiveDesc.Name: Darkness
PassiveDesc.Desc: Starting with the third Scene, uses the Combat Page 'Darkness' every 3 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Sleepy Eyes
PassiveDesc.Desc: Each time an ally is defeated, permanently gain 5 Feeble and Disarm. When all allies die, all Stagger damage resistances change to "Fatal".

PassiveDesc.Name: Misdeeds Not Allowed!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Offensive dice gain +50 Power when clashing against Offensive dice

PassiveDesc.Name: They Must Be Punished!
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character takes damage, inflicts 'Punishee' on the attacker. Enters Punishment mode next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Punishment!
PassiveDesc.Desc: In Punishment mode, the number of Speed dice increases to 5 for one Scene, and uses a special Combat Page against the character that attacked him last. Also, all Stagger damage resistances change to "Fatal".

PassiveDesc.Name: To Protect…
PassiveDesc.Desc: When Roland is not in Punishment mode, gain Vigilance every 2 Scenes, and switch between attack and defense modes each Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Chase Away…
PassiveDesc.Desc: When Roland is in Punishment mode, enter attack mode for the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Forest Keeper
PassiveDesc.Desc: Prioritizes targeting Staggered characters. Speed is fixed at specific values each Scene. Offensive dice gain +2 Power against targets with slower Speed.

PassiveDesc.Name: Roost
PassiveDesc.Desc: HP does not go below 1. When HP drops to 1, go into a dormant state, and awaken in 3 Scenes with full HP and Stagger Resist.

PassiveDesc.Name: Tattered Bandages
PassiveDesc.Desc: Takes no damage from Bleed, Burn, or Fairy.

PassiveDesc.Name: Mark of Sin
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the battle, gain 10 Marks of Sin. On hit, transfer a stack of Mark of Sin to the target. All dice gain Power equal to the amount of Marks of Sin the target has.

PassiveDesc.Name: Unjust Scale
PassiveDesc.Desc: Starting with Scene 1, all characters gain 1 Mark of Sin at the start of each Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Judgement
PassiveDesc.Desc: If a character has 5 or more Marks of Sin at the start of the Scene, uses a special Combat Page: ‘Judgement’, on them.

PassiveDesc.Name: Ceaseless Judgement
PassiveDesc.Desc: If three or more characters have 3+ Marks of Sin at the start of the Scene, uses a Mass attack page: ‘Ceaseless Judgement’.

PassiveDesc.Name: Overflowing Misdeeds
PassiveDesc.Desc: After using 'Judgement' or 'Ceaseless Judgement', lose 25% of Max. Stagger Resist.

PassiveDesc.Name: Piercing Shriek
PassiveDesc.Desc: After taking an attack, uses the Combat Page 'Piercing Shriek' next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Monster in the Black Forest
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses 3 out of 8 possible patterns over 3 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Three Birds
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every two Scenes, switch the active egg effect for Apocalypse Bird. The Apocalypse Bird's eggs cycle in the following order: Big Eyes -> Small Beak -> Long Arms -> (Repeat). Roland's resistances change depending on the currently active egg effect.

PassiveDesc.Name: Cracking Eggs
PassiveDesc.Desc: If Staggered while the Apocalypse Bird's egg effect is active, the character will lose HP, and the currently active egg effect will be permanently expired. At the start of the next Scene, recover from Stagger, purge all status ailments, and gain 2 Strength and Endurance.

PassiveDesc.Name: Eternal Peace
PassiveDesc.Desc: HP does not go below 75%.

PassiveDesc.Name: Eternal Tranquility
PassiveDesc.Desc: HP does not go below 50%.

PassiveDesc.Name: Eternal Silence
PassiveDesc.Desc: HP does not go below 25%.

PassiveDesc.Name: Big Bird’s Recollection
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses designated Combat Pages. This pattern will not be used once Big Eyes' effect expires.

PassiveDesc.Name: Judgement Bird’s Remembrance
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses designated Combat Pages. This pattern will not be used once Long Arms' effect expires.

PassiveDesc.Name: Punishing Bird’s Recalling
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses designated Combat Pages. This pattern will not be used once Small Beak's effect expires.

PassiveDesc.Name: Apocalypse Bird
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses designated Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Apocalypse Bird
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses designated Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Prophet
PassiveDesc.Desc: Untargetable. HP and Stagger Resist do not fall below 1. Prevents Burn, Bleed, or Erosion.

PassiveDesc.Name: Place Your Trust in Me
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, uses the Combat Page 'Baptism' for the number of dead Apostles.

PassiveDesc.Name: From the End of the World
PassiveDesc.Desc: Proceeds to the next phase after 12 Apostles have been defeated.

PassiveDesc.Name: The time has come.
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses the Combat Page 'Rise and Serve Me' on the first Scene. Starting with the third Scene, uses the Combat Page 'I am thy Saviour' every 3 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Rise, my servants. Rise and serve me.
PassiveDesc.Desc: Summons 2 Guardian Apostles on the second Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Why art thou in fear?
PassiveDesc.Desc: All librarians are Staggered on the first Scene. Uses the Combat Page 'Do Not Deny Me'.

PassiveDesc.Name: I am with thee.
PassiveDesc.Desc: Summons 2 Guardian Apostles on the second Scene. Apply '???' to the Patron Librarian.
Remove all Combat Pages from the Patron Librarian, and give him special Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Undying
PassiveDesc.Desc: HP does not fall below 1.

PassiveDesc.Name: Suspended
PassiveDesc.Desc: Becomes indefinitely Staggered if HP falls to 2 or lower. Can only recover from Stagger when Paradise Lost uses a Combat Page that 'resurrects' the Apostle.

PassiveDesc.Name: I will Follow Thee
PassiveDesc.Desc: Offensive dice gain +2 Power against librarians afflicted with 'Revelation'.

PassiveDesc.Name: Guardian
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, give 5 Protection and Stagger Protection to Paradise Lost. If this character is Suspended, Angela's resistances will change to "Fatal" next Scene; the character will not give her Protection or Stagger Protection until it recovers from the Suspended state.

PassiveDesc.Name: I Shall Preserve Thee
PassiveDesc.Desc: Prioritizes targeting librarians that attacked Paradise Lost in the previous Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Reborn
PassiveDesc.Desc: Has the same resistances as the Key page of a certain librarian.

PassiveDesc.Name: Scythe Apostle
PassiveDesc.Desc: Prioritizes targeting the librarian with the lowest HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Spear Apostle
PassiveDesc.Desc: Prioritizes targeting librarians with status ailments.

PassiveDesc.Name: Facing the Past
PassiveDesc.Desc: The battle is lost if this character is defeated.

PassiveDesc.Name: Angela
PassiveDesc.Desc: Has a unique Key page and Combat Pages that cannot be replaced or swapped. Cannot attribute passive abilities.

PassiveDesc.Name: Director of her Role’s Namesake
PassiveDesc.Desc: Draw 2 additional pages at the start of the Act. At the start of the Scene, restore 1 Light and draw 1 page.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Seed of Light
PassiveDesc.Desc: The Emotions of all allies build up twice as fast.
Gain E.G.O pages whenever the battle progresses to the next phase. After using 9 unique E.G.O pages, gain a special E.G.O page.

PassiveDesc.Name: Refracting
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Scars
PassiveDesc.Desc: Take 1-5 less damage from Slash attacks.

PassiveDesc.Name: Blood
PassiveDesc.Desc: Block Dice Power +3

PassiveDesc.Name: Palpitating
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pulsating Motion
PassiveDesc.Desc: Goes on the offensive every 4 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pneumonic Rally
PassiveDesc.Desc: After going on the offensive, spawn Lungs of Craving and lose 30 HP until there are 4 other allies at the end of the Scene. If Staggered, the Lungs are spawned when the character recovers from Stagger.

PassiveDesc.Name: Aspiration Pneumonia
PassiveDesc.Desc: Becomes Staggered after 8 or more allies have been defeated.

PassiveDesc.Name: Scattered Wishes
PassiveDesc.Desc: When Staggered, the amount of 'Hankering' and the character's pattern of behavior are reset.

PassiveDesc.Name: Craving
PassiveDesc.Desc: Possesses a unique effect that relates to Aspiration's 'Hankering'.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fervent Beats
PassiveDesc.Desc: If there are two or fewer allied units excluding Aspiration, lose the 'Craving' effect and gain the 'Fervent Beats' status.

PassiveDesc.Name: Mirroring
PassiveDesc.Desc: Copies the Patron Librarian's deck. At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0. (Ignores 'A Song of Lies')

PassiveDesc.Name: Liar
PassiveDesc.Desc: Starting with the third Scene: every 3 Scenes, inflicts 10 Bind to self and uses 1~2 pages that contain false information (referred to as "Lies").

PassiveDesc.Name: Caught Long-nosed
PassiveDesc.Desc: When a page containing a Lie clashes against 'Lying is Bad!', all dice on the page lose 8 Power.

PassiveDesc.Name: Joyous Fible-fable
PassiveDesc.Desc: When a page containing a Lie does not clash against 'Lying is Bad!', all dice on the page gain 8 Power.

PassiveDesc.Name: Why is it Bad?
PassiveDesc.Desc: After the Lie has been sniffed out, all allies are inflicted with 4 Feeble and Disarm next Scene and all Stagger damage resistances change to "Fatal" for the next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Lalala~
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the Lie isn't busted, all allies gain 4 Strength and Endurance next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: A Song of Lies
PassiveDesc.Desc: Copies the first Assistant Librarian's deck. While this character is alive, randomize the Costs of all Combat Pages whose original Cost is 3 or less in all characters' hands at the start of each Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: A Song in Backward
PassiveDesc.Desc: Copies the second Assistant Librarian's deck. While this character is alive, all allies also copy the status effects of the librarians they copied decks from.

PassiveDesc.Name: A Song for All
PassiveDesc.Desc: Copies the third Assistant Librarian's deck. While this character is alive, all allies gain 2 Strength or 2 Endurance at the start of each Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: A Song of Curiosity
PassiveDesc.Desc: Copies the fourth Assistant Librarian's deck. While this character is alive, all librarians shuffle their hand into the draw pile and draw 3 pages at the start of each Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Biting Wind
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, all librarians lose HP equal to 5% of their Max HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Reticent Frigidity
PassiveDesc.Desc: Takes no damage from attacks until all Prisons of Ice are destroyed. Takes no damage from Burn or Bleed.

PassiveDesc.Name: Frost Column
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gains Speed dice and Light capacity based on the number of destroyed Prisons of Ice. If two or more Prisons have been destroyed, a melee Combat Page is added to this character's deck.

PassiveDesc.Name: Those who know the Cruelty of Winter and the Aroma of Roses
PassiveDesc.Desc: After all Prisons of Ice have been destroyed, all librarians recover 50% of their Max HP at the start of the next Scene. The Snow Queen will use a Mass Attack page the same Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Coldhearted
PassiveDesc.Desc: Immune to Immobilization.

PassiveDesc.Name: Kai and Gerda
PassiveDesc.Desc: If this character's HP drops to 0, an imprisoned librarian is freed next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.
The battle proceeds to the next phase when both the Nail and the Hammer are defeated.

PassiveDesc.Name: Status Immunity
PassiveDesc.Desc: Takes no damage from status ailments.

PassiveDesc.Name: Grin
PassiveDesc.Desc: Immune to Immobilization.

PassiveDesc.Name: Leer
PassiveDesc.Desc: When hit, reduce incoming damage by the Cost of 'Guilt' the attacker has.

PassiveDesc.Name: Nail
PassiveDesc.Desc: Fully restores Light every Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Guilt
PassiveDesc.Desc: Dice gain Power by the page's Cost.

PassiveDesc.Name: A Gap in the Mind
PassiveDesc.Desc: On hit, a page with the highest Cost in the target's hand is inflicted with 'Cost Down'.

PassiveDesc.Name: Hammer
PassiveDesc.Desc: Fully restores Light on odd-numbered Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: A Crack in the Mind
PassiveDesc.Desc: On hit, a page with the highest Cost in the target's hand is inflicted with 'Cost Up'.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Blossoming Desires
PassiveDesc.Desc: When hit, gain +10 Power for all dice next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Black Feathers
PassiveDesc.Desc: Takes half as much damage from status ailments.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Crushing Instincts
PassiveDesc.Desc: Dice gain Power equal to the current Cost of 'Guilt' the target has (If target has no Guilt, no Power is gained)

PassiveDesc.Name: Black Feathers
PassiveDesc.Desc: Takes half as much damage from status ailments.
